name: Mado helm·Night sakura
description: Whitesmith workshop invited Kafra Co.'s famous designer Enos to build a Mado helm set for the Mechanics, this design suits Pink Mecha well.

name: Madogear Fuel
description: Special Fuel and an consumable essential to Madogear.

name: Magatama hair band
description: Traditional Headwear of Amatsu witches, can bring wearer a special Japanese style charm.It says that you will meet your lover while watching the sakura with it!

name: Mage Badge
description: Mage Badge.

name: Mage Camera
description: A camera.

name: Mage Coat
description: The clothes handed down by the ancient wizards, it helps increase wearer's mental strength.

name: Mage Coat [1]
description: The clothes handed down by the ancient wizards, it helps increase wearer's mental strength.

name: Mage Hat
description: Mage's hat that when you put your hand inside, a rabbit is likely to come out. It's very sturdy and will not break up easily.

name: Mage Hat
description: Any capable Mage would want this hat. Hat that looks strange but brings comfort and energy to the wearer.

name: Magic Absorbing Ice
description: Ice drink sprinkled with magic absorbing powder, the soft taste is much impressive. Eating it decreases all magic damage you suffer to 1 point, the effect lasts 8 seconds. All ice drinks share 1-min CD, and can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Magic Bible Vol1
description: A heavy book full of small words. The book seems to come out in series.
